ygData.subject: Re: Casters' Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Staff of writhing is not 2hd blunt, its 1hd blunt. Btw, at higher level, I think casters can hold a book which +30 mana and +int too. I saw from webpages that
ygData.messageBody:
Staff of writhing is not 2hd blunt, its 1hd blunt. Btw, at higher level, I
think casters can hold a book which +30 mana and +int too. I saw from
webpages that you need to hold that in primary hand, so NO weapon )
-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, July 12, 1999 9:50 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Casters' Stuff


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>It's best to use melee and casting for casters till u reach lvl 12. Too
>dependent on casting alone at early stages will be u a pure mage which cant
>do any soloing. Not to forget we casters are rising melee skill at
>3x(lvl+1), and gap only widen all the way as compared to other classes. If
>u dun use it now, I guess u wont use it in future. ;)
>
>
>Ziltus, the wiz who tank with his body.
>
>
>On Saturday, 10 July, 1999 12:42 PM, Synzzz [SMTP:hannibal@...]
>wrote:
>> From: "Synzzz" <hannibal@...>
>>
>> Actually,
>>

>> I'm starting to find my weapon hands unused more often than not...
>> Too busy casting to actually go and physically attack. Yeah..i want

>>
>> Zanderion (Unlucky Lvl Magi)
>>
